snippet: A new company, DJZ, plans to introduce an online hub that will aggregate news about electronic dance music and celebrate top D.J.’s as cultural heroes.
abstract: DJZ plans to introduce an online hub that will aggregate news about electronic dance music, or EDM, and celebrate top DJ's, trying to capitalize on music industry's latest focus, which lures tens of thousands of fans to festivals and is dominating pop radio.
lead_paragraph: A new company, DJZ, plans to introduce an online hub that will aggregate news about electronic dance music and celebrate top D.J.’s as cultural heroes.

headline.seo: A Creator of Turntable.fm Plans Online Hub DJZ
headline.main: Building a Home Online to Suit Electronic Music
headline.print_headline: Building a Home Online To Suit Electronic Music
